sections.heading: General
sections.text:
powers and duties of Legislative Counsel and Legal Division regarding revision

of statutes.

sections.heading: Recommendations
sections.text: regarding elimination of obsolete or antiquated statutes.

sections.heading: Secretary
sections.text:
of State to make records, books and statutes available to Legislative Counsel

for inspection.

sections.heading: Preparation
sections.text: and publication of annotations and supplements to NRS.

sections.heading: Preparation
sections.text: and publication of digest of judicial opinions concerning Nevada law.

sections.heading: Compilation,
sections.text:
organization, revision and publication of NRS: Form and style; numbering and

arrangement; inclusion of notes and reference materials; changes and

corrections; legal effect of renumbering; resolution of nonsubstantive

conflicts between multiple laws.

sections.heading: References
sections.text:
in NRS to certain persons and matters to be made using respectful or

appropriate language.

sections.heading: Printing
sections.text: and reproduction of NRS; prices and sales; retention of master copy.

sections.heading: Authorized
sections.text: expenditures from Legislative Fund to pay for costs related to publications.

sections.heading: Acceptance
sections.text: of gifts, grants and bequests to pay for costs related to publications.

sections.heading: Printing
sections.text: and reproduction of supplements; prices and sales.

sections.heading: Distribution
sections.text: of NRS and supplements to Legislators; payment of costs.

sections.heading: Distribution
sections.text:
of NRS and supplements to district, justice and municipal courts; payment of

costs.

sections.heading: Certification
sections.text:
of NRS and supplements; citation of NRS as official codified version of

Statutes of Nevada and prima facie evidence of law; form of citations to NRS.
